about_the_game:
Hello Charlotte: EP1


This demo contains the whole EP1 of Hello Charlotte series. It's 1-2 hours long.

Synopsis

Hello, new Puppeteer!
Meet Charlotte - a puppet you will control. Meet her alien friends, maggot cat and a certain Observer.

Dive deep into horrors of junk food, TV world, religion and romance novels for middle-age women. Keep your puppet safe at all times. Or don't.

Have fun dying!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 x 768 pixels desktop resolution
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card

short_description: Horror Parody RPG with a Sci-Fi Twist
